metadata.dc:author: Marín Salazar, J J
Mateos Rodríguez, F
Rodríguez Encinas, A
Peréz Arellano, J L
Luna Rodrigo, G
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of death from septic shock with multiorganic failure of tuberculosis origin. We described, the pathogenic mechanism of the sepsis and respiratory distress due to Mycobacterium tuberculosis. Another aspect of interest was the hemodynamic demonstration of septic shock due to M. tuberculosis.
metadata.dc:title: Shock séptico y fallo multiorgánico por Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
[Septic shock and multiple organ failure caused by Mycobacterium tuberculosis].
